item.title: How do i host server thingy
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

after you run the server, you need a network, make it a simple network and set the pass to 123 or anything rememberable, so other can join your network.if you need more help just pm me instead of using this other thread
